title: Himi 166
lyrics:
M.NG.
1.
Sīsū na’e ‘ikai te ke
Fakafisi koe,
Ka na’a ke ngāue ma’u pē,
Ma’a e tangata.
2.
‘Eiki ne ‘ikai mamae
‘E ho māfimafi
Ki he fa’a ngāue lahi,
Kia kimautolu.
3.
Ko hoku faka’ilonga,
‘A e ‘Afiona,
Pea ‘oku fu’u ngingila
Pea u tokanga’i.
4.
Pea u fa’ifa’itaki,
Ki he ‘Afiona
’I he me’a kotoa pē,
Pea u fai ma’u pē.
5.
Ke hoko ‘eku ngāue,
Mo ‘eku mahalo
Ko e feilaulau ia, mo
‘Eku ngaahi lea.
6.
Pea u mo’ua lelei ma’u pē,
‘I he me’a maama,
Pea u ‘ata’atāina
‘I he maveuveua.
7.
’E mo’ua pē hoku nima
Pea ‘e ngata ai,
Ka ‘e ‘i he ‘Afiona,
Hoku laumālie. *
